TopicTitle: Can't cmplete "Orbit Kerbin for two days" contract

Articles.Content:
Hello !

I am stuck with a contract I can't seem to finish. Here is the contract :

I first tried to do it, then reverted because I lacked batteries (). Then I tried it again, and it won't calculate the time remaining like it did the first time I launched.

Above is the contract on the tooltip. When I try to do it again, only the "Orbit" paragraph becomes green after I accomplish orbit above 70km. Even after I stayed on orbit for like 3 days...

Thanks you for your time and explanations

Edited August 26, 2015 by Buisson

I suppose this contract is not stock.

If so, are you using Kerbin time (1 day = 6h) or Earth time (1d = 24h) ?

The contract may be counting days in Earth time, so 2 days in Earth time would make 8 days in Kerbin time (or 48h).

I suppose this contract is not stock.

If so, are you using Kerbin time (1 day = 6h) or Earth time (1d = 24h) ?

The contract may be counting days in Earth time, so 2 days in Earth time would make 8 days in Kerbin time (or 48h).

The contract is from tjsnh's Advanced Progression Contracts. Are you sure you reverted, versus trying it with another vessel? It looks like you managed to get the contract into an unwinnable state - the vessel it's looking for to meet the second parameter no longer exists, and it won't try to pick a new one because the first parameter is already met. You'll have to cancel the contract and re-accept it.

That being said, there's probably a few better ways for this contract to be written that are less error prone. I'd suggest posting on the thread linked above about it (if tjnsh is interested in reworking it I can provide the details to him).

Thank you for your answers !

It is indeed from the Advanced Progression Contracts. I might have reverted, then tried another mission in the meantime with a new vessel. That might have confused the code of the contract.

I will post a link on the topic you mentioned.

For now, I will cancel the contract and re-accept it. I thought doing that would erase the contract for ever.

Thank you ! KSP is a better world with all you modders
